extendedInfo.description: Do you often want to copy to a friend or share a piece of text from other applications (Line or WhatsApp, etc.) are very troublesome step it?This application uses the minimum floating window that allows you to share the steps become super-simpleHow to use: (please see our sample pictures)1 First select the text you want to share, click Copy.2 Click "According to my share."3 Select the application you want to share.You can also customize Copy and Share color and location, very easy to use
